derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ceaffinc 'chaff finch' (because it forages around barns, picking seeds out of the chaff)

entry.def: A chaffinch is a small European bird. Male chaffinches have reddish-brown fronts and grey heads.

means.word_mean: 1. small European finch with a cheerful song

auth_sentence.content: But the most notable feature is the sudden increase in chaffinch song.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the most notable feature is the sudden increase in chaffinch song.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the most notable feature is the sudden increase in chaffinch song.

auth_sentence.content: It was the first proper burst of chaffinch song of the year.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was the first proper burst of chaffinch song of the year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was the first proper burst of chaffinch song of the year.

auth_sentence.content: There are few things as lovely as a cock chaffinch, and few birds less exciting.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are few things as lovely as a cock chaffinch, and few birds less exciting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are few things as lovely as a cock chaffinch, and few birds less exciting.
